title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 80.3 - Successor attorney
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 80.3 - Successor attorney

State Regulations

Where another attorney was previously retained in
connection with such proceeding, the substituted attorney shall file the notice
of substitution and appearance, prescribed by the State Liquor Authority, prior
to or at the time of his first appearance in the proceeding. The substituted
attorney shall also certify that a copy of said notice of substitution and
appearance has been served on the superseded attorney, or, if not, will be
served by regular mail or otherwise within 24 hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
80.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
